mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, title, cover, date_time, author, gzh, status, is_deleted, be_read_num, summary
mapper.select: select id, title, date_time, author, gzh from t_ams_recommended_article where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0
select count(1) from t_ams_recommended_article where is_deleted = 0
select id, update_time from t_ams_recommended_article where is_deleted = 0 order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_ams_recommended_article
id,
create_time,
update_time,
title,
cover,
date_time,
author,
gzh,
status,
is_deleted,
be_read_num,
summary,

#{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
#{beReadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_ams_recommended_article
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gzh = #{gzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
be_read_num = #{beReadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_ams_recommended_article set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gzh = #{gzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, be_read_num = #{beReadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
